summary: This is a brief email from December 11, 2018, reporting a technical issue with a security camera on Pearl Street, stating there is no video from that side of a building. The document appears to be routine maintenance correspondence related to a property's surveillance system.

events.title: Pearl Street Camera Malfunction Reported
events.description: An email was sent reporting that the security camera for Pearl Street is out, resulting in no video from that side of the building.

keyFacts: A security camera on Pearl Street was reported as non-functional on December 11, 2018.
The malfunction resulted in a lack of video surveillance from the Pearl Street side of a building.
The document is a routine maintenance request or status update regarding property security.
